name: places/ChIJR3bS0YRYwokRfln9lqbkXXA
formattedAddress: 60 W 86th St, New York, NY 10024, USA
adrFormatAddress: 60 W 86th St, New York, NY 10024-3602, USA

originalText.text:
Want to preface this by saying I want to continue to use this place, mainly because of the convenience. They provide the laundry component of their service well enough. Their employees are nice, especially the ones who come to pick up the laundry. I honestly hope that my opinion over time will change and I will be able to rate 5 stars.

First star off - broke my bag by holding it by the drawstring instead of the neck. The weight snapped the drawstring, and they didn’t mention it, and haven’t offered to compensate me in any way. The fact that they didn’t mention the destruction of my property feels disingenuous, but I want to give them the benefit of the doubt. Tied it extremely tightly in a way that makes it so the bag no longer opens all the way.

Second star off - to reduce the weight and make it easier to hold so they wouldn’t snap my bag again, I used two bags, splitting about 15 pounds into two bags. They charged me as if I had two ten pound bags, because they have a ten pound minimum, but apparently it’s per bag and not per order. I tried to make pickup easier for them and got charged extra - ouch.

In total I’ve spent $72 for about 27 pounds of laundry, if you include the bag replacement fee, for an average of $2.67 per pound.

originalText.text: I’ve had great experiences with Straus’s wash and fold service. Everyone is so friendly, the pick-up and drop-off service is complimentary and super reliable, and my clothes always come back clean and in good condition.

text.text: I’ve had great experiences with Straus’s wash and fold service. Everyone is so friendly, the pick-up and drop-off service is complimentary and super reliable, and my clothes always come back clean and in good condition.

originalText.text: Karem and the whole team are great! Whether you’re doing wash & fold, dry cleaning, or having something tailored, they do it well!

text.text: Karem and the whole team are great! Whether you’re doing wash & fold, dry cleaning, or having something tailored, they do it well!

originalText.text:
I live across the street and so want this place to be good but it’s not - save yourself the stress and go to one of the million other options around. They advertise same day service but it’s a gamble - just had to call 3 times looking for clothes I should have gotten yesterday. I explained several times that I’m leaving for a trip this morning and needed them back yesterday.

No apology. The guy on the phone couldn’t have cared less and the explanation I got was “the lady didn’t do it.” I don’t even know what that means? Horrible.

No apology. The guy on the phone couldn’t have cared less and the explanation I got was “the lady didn’t do it.” I don’t even know what that means? Horrible.

originalText.text: This place is a SCAM, literally go anywhere but here. They do not do 24 hour return as advertised,  they were late to pick up, they over charged my by $15, and they lied about pricing when I initially called them. They didn't say there was a higher price to hang dry, or that each bag weight limit was separate. Total waste of money and time. Super rude and terrible customer service. They don't automatically deliver back, even though they say they do. I called to ask when my delivery would happen and they said I had to tell them I needed it delivered. They said I need to pay over the phone, which I was happy to do. The woman told me I owed $25 and I gave her my card info. Lo and behold, I was charged $40. Wouldn't fix this when I called. They were my neighborhood and I literally would have come here every single week if they hadn't been so terrible and overcharged me.
